list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The fox threw the hounds off the scent and escaped.
The film star was constantly hounded by newspaper reporters.

list_ex_of_english: However, it is inconvenient for farmers to allow the hounds to come more frequently.
My daughter's education was ruined because of the hounding that she received at school.
I believe that there should be some form of law to prevent saboteurs from interfering with hounds at a meet.
Even the major airlines are doing the same, hounded by the competition.
I have made no specific assessment of the impact of a ban on hunting with hounds.
She is hounded for the extra money that is paid to her.
None of the no voters was hounded—quite the opposite.
Nothing in the course if a deer's life resembles being hunted by hounds; known pattern of predation by wolves do not resemble hunting.
